channel.title: Comments on: Environmental NGO online strategy

item.title: By: Steve
item.dc:creator: Steve
item.description: Hi Sam, It was a few years ago so Carlos may now have a more specific web strategy or the Ecuadorian enviromental NGO scene may be using the web more. This post is just trying to highlight that in some cases holding back on doing a web presenece can be a good idea.
item.content:encoded: Hi Sam, It was a few years ago so Carlos may now have a more specific web strategy or the Ecuadorian enviromental NGO scene may be using the web more. This post is just trying to highlight that in some cases holding back on doing a web presenece can be a good idea.

item.title: By: Sam Barnes
item.dc:creator: Sam Barnes
item.description: I was just looking at their SEO volunteer position, I am currently trying to gain experience in the industry and thought they may be a good starting point,. After reading this article, maybe I will look elsewhere. Thank you.
